title: Car make fonts
content:
Can anyone help with this request.....Very tough...I need to know the following fonts..or get close...  
Cadillac font, Pontiac font, Hummer Font, GMC Font, Buick font...  
very appreciative....I know you will need the logo....its the on the dealer site of each make.

Please help..anything close to all 5 makes of car fonts????

We use frontpage and microsoft imagecomposer....

Can anyone tell me the font for each make and where to download???

1000x Thanks All!
author: dealerfont

comments.content:
Most auto makers have custom-designed fonts.

Can you post specific examples of what you need? We can't do _all_ your work for you.

- Lex
Those are really old versions of Sofachrome, King Richard, Hemi Head and Good Times. Definitely pick up new versions from MyFonts.com
